# defaultSlopeLimit

**Type Property**

The slope limit value RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.

## Declaration

```swift
static let defaultSlopeLimit: Float
```

## Reading default values

- **defaultHeight**: The capsule height value RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.
- **defaultRadius**: The capsule default radius RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.
- **defaultSkinWidth**: The skin width value RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.
- **defaultStepLimit**: The step limit value RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.
- **defaultUpVector**: The default up vector RealityKit applies when you use the default initializer.
